property.name: hbase.region.server.rpc.scheduler.factory.class
property.description: Factory to create the Phoenix RPC Scheduler that uses separate queues for index and metadata updates

property.name: hbase.rpc.controllerfactory.class
property.description: Factory to create the Phoenix RPC Scheduler that uses separate queues for index and metadata updates

property.name: phoenix.queryserver.http.port
property.description: Specifies a port the server will listen on. Default is 8765.
